import React , {useState} from 'react'; import PagesHeader from '../../components/PagesHeader'; import "./style.css"; import Input from '../../components/Input'; import warningIcon from "../../Assets/images/icons/warning.svg"; import Textarea from '../../components/TextArea'; import Select from '../../components/Select'; function TeacherForm(){ const scheduleItems = [ {week_day:0,from:'8:00 AM', to:'4:00 PM'}, {week_day:2,from:'10:00 AM', to:'6:00 PM'}, ] function addNewScheduleItem(){ scheduleItems.push({ week_day:0, from:'', to:'' }) } return(
